text: Akhtaruzzaman Alamgir is a Bangladesh Nationalist Party politician and the former Member of Parliament of Patuakhali-1. ==Career== Alamgir was elected to parliament from Patuakhali-1 as a Bangladesh Nationalist Party candidate in 1979. ==References== Category:Bangladesh Nationalist Party politicians Category:Living people Category:2nd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Akhtaruzzaman Alamgir
